The Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York has released the schedule for its inaugural 2019 edition, titled The Best of Friends. The event will run from February 26 to April 6, 2020. “Best of Friends is a collaborative, multi-media, experiential platform for engaging with the themes of friendship, beauty, and art, and the discipline of art and art history,” said Museum director Daniel H. Weiss. “The theme of friendship is an ideal combination of philosophical and playful, and the medium for creating what I believe is the best of art and art history, which is the art of human connection and the art of art as the vehicle for the most intimate of relationships.”The biennial is supported with funds from the Alexandrian Foundation, the Charles and Lucille King Family Foundation, and the Joslyn Foundation.
